singleItemContent: What is your typical morning routine?
What would you like to change about it?
Do you think breakfast is important?
What is the best thing about your morning routine at the weekends?
Describe a typical day at work/college/university. You should say:
what your favourite part of the day is and explain what you would like to change about this routine.
What is the attitude towards arriving late in your country?
When is it very important to be on time?
How can people make sure that they are never late?
What factors influence most people's daily routines?
Do you think people get enough choice in their daily routines?
How do you think people's routines will change in the future?
